management B-res_skill

Experience O
in O
; O
Assistant B-seniority

Engineer O
3 O
Concrete O
Checking O
Contractor O
's O
laboratory O
facilities O
for O

and O
testing O

samples O
inspecting O
the O
quality O

of O
screening O
batching O
plants O
including O

performing O

tests O

purposes O

cores O
